title: [Digital Tutors] Character Concept Design and Development in Pho
description:
[Digital Tutors] Character Concept Design and Development in Photoshop-KTR
==========================================================================


PUBLISHER....: Digital Tutors 
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Lauren Nichols
LEVEL.........: ADVANCED
RUNTIME......: 2H 21M
SOFTWARE.....: Photoshop CS5


About this course::

Throughout these lessons you will learn the process of creating and developing an original character, as well as learning my own approach to painting digitally. We will have a quick overview of the entire process, from designing, to initial sketches and turnarounds. As well as learn how to quickly and effectively paint original characters. By the end of this tutorial, you will have learned how to use multiple design methods to ensure quick and successful creations.



Topics include:

1.Introduction and project overview

2.Fundamentals of effective character design

3.Implementing explorative sketching

4.Idea development and silhouetting

5.Establishing color theory

6.Developing our drawing

7.Creating an accurate turnaround

8.Preparing our character for digital painting

9.Creating a thumbnail for painting

10.Sketching and speed painting

11.Refining and cleaning

12.Adjusting texture and color

13.Adding a background and filters

14.Finalization and key points
